SEARCH
Package com.app.controller

Class ShopController

java.lang.Object
com.app.controller.ShopController
@RequestMapping("/shop") @RestController public class ShopController extends Object
Controller for handling shop-related statistics and data aggregation.

This class provides endpoints for fetching shop-related statistics such as top clients based on payment, most popular categories, product pricing statistics, client demographics, and debt information.

  • Method Details

    • getClientWithBiggerPayment

      @GetMapping("/clients/top") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<ClientDto>> getClientWithBiggerPayment()
      Retrieves the clients with the biggest payments.

      This endpoint returns a list of clients who have made the largest payments.

      Returns:
      a ResponseDto containing a list of ClientDto representing the clients with the largest payments.

    • getClientWithBiggerPaymentInCategory

      @GetMapping("/clients/top/{category}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<ClientDto>> getClientWithBiggerPaymentInCategory(@PathVariable String category)
      Retrieves the clients with the biggest payments in a specific category.

      This endpoint returns a list of clients who have made the largest payments in a given product category.

      Parameters:
      category - the product category for which to find clients with the largest payments.
      Returns:
      a ResponseDto containing a list of ClientDto representing the clients with the largest payments in the given category.

    • getAgeAndMostCategory

      @GetMapping("/clients/age/category") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<GroupByDto<Integer,String>>> getAgeAndMostCategory()
      Retrieves the most popular product category for each age group.

      This endpoint returns a list of age groups and the most popular product category for each age group.

      Returns:
      a ResponseDto containing a list of GroupByDto representing age groups and their most popular categories.

    • getCategoryAndPriceStatistic

      @GetMapping("/products/category/price_statistic") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<CategoryAndPriceStatisticDto>> getCategoryAndPriceStatistic()
      Retrieves category-wise product price statistics.

      This endpoint returns the price statistics for products categorized by their product type.

      Returns:
      a ResponseDto containing a list of CategoryAndPriceStatisticDto representing product category price statistics.

    • getAgeAndMostProduct

      @GetMapping("clients/age/product") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<GroupByDto<Integer,ProductDto>>> getAgeAndMostProduct()
      Retrieves the most popular product for each age group.

      This endpoint returns a list of age groups and the most popular product purchased by customers in each age group.

      Returns:
      a ResponseDto containing a list of GroupByDto representing age groups and their most popular products.

    • getCategoryAndMostClient

      @GetMapping("/clients/category") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ResponseDto<List<GroupByDto<String,ClientDto>>> getCategoryAndMostClient()
      Retrieves the most common clients in each product category.

      This endpoint returns a list of product categories and the most common clients within each category.

      Returns:
      a ResponseDto containing a list of GroupByDto representing product categories and their most common clients.

    • getClientsAndDebt

      @GetMapping("/clients/debits") public ResponseDto<List<ClientAndDebitDto>> getClientsAndDebt()
      Retrieves clients and their associated debts.

      This endpoint returns a list of clients along with their corresponding debit amounts.

      Returns:
      a ResponseDto containing a list of ClientAndDebitDto representing clients and their debts.
